value.0:
On helmets or hoods, my master recommends specific spells, always with adequate funds and life energy available.

Clarity - For Clearer Use of Spellcraft
Eagle's Splendor - For Glamerous Force of Personality
Find Traps - For a Keener Eye to Detail
Fox's Cunning - For a Better Mental Alacrity
Identify - To Invoke Loremaster's Magic
Legend Lore - To Improve Arcane Capacity
Lesser Mind Blank - To Protect The Mind
Resistance - For Resilence To All Negative Effects
See Invisibility - For Vision At Night
True Seeing - To See Things As They Are
Ultravision - To Invoke the Watchman's Magic
